title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveToX Renata Mia -15 50>>
<<moveToY Renata Mia 0 50>>
Renata: This looks like the door!
<<moveUp Renata 25 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
Renata: I can't get it to budge.
Mia: What if we both push?
<<faceUp Renata>>
<<moveUp Mia 25 30>>
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
Mia: Nope.
Renata: Maybe there's another way in?
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
[[end]]
